eewa nam anupilawela anuwa desima, arthayata adala karunu dakwa deshana kirima, anukampawen deshana karannan wima, aamishayak balaporoththu nowi karana deshanayak wima, thama usaskota an aya pahath kota pawathwana deshanayak nowima yana eewayi.

niyagin pida widina merata janaya amathaka kota palasthinaya wani muslim ratakata amarikanu dolar miliyanak aadhara dima, badiyudin amathiwaraya wilpaththu wanaya sanhara karamin kala muslim janapadakaranaya, ee sadaha aanduwe kerumaku wu basil rajapaksha amathyawarayage sahayogaya athayi prasiddiye chodana kirima, halal athulu muslim anthawadaya madalimata rajaya kisidu piyawarak noganima, purawidya wadagath kamakin yuthu bauddha urumaya sahitha aithihasika pradesha muslim janaya aakramanaya kirima, palli idikirima, aadi nahuthayak karana peramunata gena me sanwedi nayakaya eeta sanwedi nowima pilibanda athishaya gramya aakarayata wiwechanaya kalaha.
